      • addGameModel

        void addGameModel(shared.model.GameModel model)
        This adds the given model to the persistence storage and creates a list of commands in the storage.
        Parameters:
        model -
        Precondition:
        model must be a valid GameModel object
        Postcondition:
        model has been added to the persistence storage

      • addCommand

        void addCommand(int gameID,
              server.commands.move.MoveCommand command)
        This updates the list of commands for the game with the given gameID
        Parameters:
        gameID -
        commands -
        Precondition:
        gameID must be a valid id for a game currently in the persistence storage
        Postcondition:
        the list of commands has been updated for the game with the given id

      • getAllGameModels

        java.util.List<shared.model.GameModel> getAllGameModels()
        This returns a list of all game models in the persistence storage
        Returns:
        list of game models in the persistence storage
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns a list of the models in the persistence storage all updated with the associated commands stored on the persistence storage. the commands for all of the games are now empty

      • getAllGameInfos

        java.util.List<client.data.GameInfo> getAllGameInfos()
        This returns a list of all game infos in the persistence storage
        Returns:
        list of game infos in the persistence storage
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns the list of game infos in the persistence storages

      • getCommands

        java.util.List<server.commands.move.MoveCommand> getCommands(int gameID)
        This returns the list of commands for the game with the given id
        Parameters:
        gameID -
        Returns:
        list of commands for game model
        Precondition:
        gameID is a valid id for a game
        Postcondition:
        returns list of commands
